Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: üõçÔ∏è
Review: simply best but maintenance are so poor everything has been changed before use to be very attractive for youth and kids as well as teenage but now you might be find any special

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Fantastic mall in the four roads junction
Review: It is one of the the best malls in Chennai that is inside the city. You can spend the entire day in shopping, watching movies, playing games and dining in the food court. There is PVR multiplex too inside the mall. Parking is free for those who booked tickets in PVR.

Name: Bhalaji N
Title: Evolving to meet demand
Review: This mall had stood for 7+ years and its continuing to renovate and improvise its space. The place is not busy all times, except weekends or holidays. I visited very recently and could see a lot of shops are under renovation now or new shops are moving in. Food court needs to improve, i didnt remember the place stink when i visited a 6 months back, situation is different now. If you are going for PVR better be early we had many times stuck in long queue and movie started before we crossed PVR security. New promotion is going on for parking fee waiver ( Oct - dec), 2 hrs fee waiver for purchase above 500INR ( any purchase including food). Place is clean for sure.

Name: Dr P Nagaraj
Title: Good Mall
Review: This is the mall with all major Shopping outlets Cinema Screens And Big Food Court with Major Food Joints

Name: GEORGE VARUVEL
Title: Not impressive
Review: This was poorly maintained and expensive/not proper parking for cars and two wheeler. There are lot of options other than this mall. Food is not a great option here.

Name: gentleman492001
Title: A little faraway from the Central station
Review: We visited the mall before going to see a movie. It is a large mall having lots of branded products. We could spend some time visiting many shops.

Name: ritesh k
Title: Worst Car Parking facility
Review: Parking space is very congested in this mall....on 30th September 2018 I had parked my vehicle on 10th floor, while coming back I found scratch on my vehicle....there was no response from the mall's staff....I paid Rs.110/- as parking fee and got scratch on my vehicle....very pathetic

Name: Azara T
Title: Great
Review: This mall used to be famous until the newer ones opened. This place is good for shopping and they have an Apple support store called imagine at the ground floor as well as a theatre. It wouldn't be my fav place to shop but it's still a good mall.

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Very good mall
Review: One of the well known malls in Chennai and famous for its PVR screens. Parking charges has been bought down and good to spend time

Name: Aaqarsh Aiyyar
Title: Vibrant little mall
Review: I visited this mid-sized mall on a weekday and spent some time shopping on all the four floors. I enjoyed the time at the food court. Children would love the gaming zone.

Name: muthukrish2000
Title: Skywalk Mall
Review: It's in Amaindakarai the mall is on the main road. It's a small mall and it has KFC, PVR cinemas, lifestyle. We went here for an movie and had a food court in 3rd Floor.

Name: Amit K
Title: A medium sized mall
Review: The mall was not that big as expected, and is between egmore and chetpet, so a bus is preferred to reach there. You can watch cinema in PVR cinemas. Although, some brand store are there, it is good to visit, if you are in Chennai.

Name: Rucha121
Title: Decent mall .. Avg PVR theatre
Review: Located bang in Poonamalle High Road on Nelson Manickam Road Junction (Nungambakam), this mall is a good hang-out place to catch up with friends. There is also PVR multiplex inside, but, rates are very high .. and even the move experience is not so great.. seating and cooling is not that great for high prices... decent food-court in the mall. parking is difficult here..

Name: Prasad B
Title: Good architecture followed by nice places for hang out !!
Review: Food court and many other places to be appreciated at.However, SKYWALK name should be used as a theme, not as a literal or epitome !!

Name: meghashyam
Title: Decent shopping experience
Review: Centrally located , ample parking space , a decent mixture of restaurants , top retail chains , PVR cinemas , well planned with the space available .

Name: anto b
Title: Good mall in the heart of city
Review: Skywalk is one of the dominant malls in Chennai and it is situated in Nelson Manickam road, Nungambakkam which is easily accessible by bus, train and own vehicles.  Many prefers this mall to watch movies in PVR cinemas followed by lunch/dinner.  Food outlets like KFC, McDonalds, Dominoes, PizzaHut are present across floors but clothing outlets are very few.  The mall is not maintained well compared to forum mall, phoenix mall or EA.  Air conditioning is very low and escalators are mostly under maintenance. Car parking is charged Rs.30 for each hour on weekends, which is acceptable.  Majority of the crowd just roam  around the mall without doing any shopping, the management has to look into this.  Overall i would recommend this mall for watching movies in PVR.  For purchase of apparels it is better to visit Forum mall or EA or phoenix.

Name: dinesh_j84
Title: Big Mall near Arumbakkam
Review: This mall is close to Arumbakkam. Movie goers can spend their time at PVR cinemas inside this mall. The mall is well connected by buses and share autos. It has a decent food court and number of shopping stores.

Name: united87
Title: Lost its charm
Review: No longer a good place to visit for shopping.. lost its popularity now and also not maintained well.. the theatres are really good and other than that not a good place to visit..

Name: drn85
Title: Skywalk.. good place to spend leisure time.
Review: Skywalk (ampa mall) is located in chennai at the Nelson manikkam road close to arumbakkam. We can reach this place by tnsrtc buses, share autos or online cabs. It's a big mall, with almost all brand shops. Kfc, pizza hut, mcd all are having their outlets here. The food court is big and it's the place which attracts the maximum. Some of the escalators were in maintainence when I visited this place. Altogether it's a good place to spend the leisure time.¬†

Name: Surendar K
Title: Decent Mall For budget friendly shopinng
Review: This mall located near anna arch, Mall is decent and  budget friendly shopping, PVR cinemas located in this mall..

Name: Dinkar P
Title: Compact mall
Review: I've been visiting this mall for many years now. Initially it was among the 4 major malls in chennai however there are many more now.While you have most affordable brands available here but the choice of very limited considering the strata of people or caters too.They have a food court as well with a lot of variety. However there is scope for the cleanliness to be improved. The mall is good for a small break and some limited shopping .During festivals they organise events in the mall which is a good attraction to go for especially kids.

Name: Rufus V
Title: Mall
Review: Mall is bit old now.. Shops feel congested.. And poor. Cooling systems... Overall experience was ok.. Movie experience at pvr was good.. Food court is also good..

Name: Ghiri T
Title: A Great Shopping Mall at Amjikarai
Review: It is a good complex with 3 floors of retail outlets,theaters,game zone and food court. i visited this place with my friends to buy clothes and accessories. Here there are many outlets with variety of collections. And the food court no words to describe. If u are near Amjikarai you should definitely go and visit this place with your friends and family to have a happy weekend..........

Name: Score G
Title: Very Average place
Review: This Mall is not one of the greatest malls in Chennai. Yo you will see that many shops are closed as the business is not very great you don't have a good choice when it comes to shopping as well everything is pretty average so I wouldn't really recommend this place as a must visit place in Chennai.

Name: Parthiban V
Title: average and quite expensive mall
Review: Games is too expensive compared to other malls...food outlets are very less but cost is high, parking cost is more due to more time taking while parking and taking out our vehicle...

Name: Karthick D
Title: Good place
Review: Good entertainment and especially theatre very good atmosphere. Ground floor and first floor westside showroom excellent and good attitude staff

Name: Partha C
Title: Skywalk Shopping Mall
Review: It is  within city centre, connecting mostly interesting places.   Food courts are good.  Variety shops and items are available.  Good place with family.

Name: RAMAKRISHNAN K
Title: Fun mall
Review: The place is quit nice d enjoyableOne would feel good since this is located in the main area The reachable from many mode of transport easilyHave great fun with movie and cricket etc

Name: Reeveenesh J
Title: Bad
Review: Very bad mall. No toilets and most of the shops are closed down. The mall looks so dull. Only shop which serves you good cloth is Prapthi. Very good clothes for good prices.

Name: Ramprasad b
Title: COMPACT MALL WITH ALL TYPES OF SHOPS
Review: Ampa mall is one of the oldest new generation malls in Chennai.  This mall is located in heart of Chennai surrounded by many residential areas like Anna Nagar, Kilpauk, Arumbakkam, Choolaimedu, Nungambakkam, Aminijikarai to name a few.This mall is compact in size as compared to Vijaya Forum Mall at Vadapalani, Express Mall at Royapetha, Phoenix Mall at Velachery.  But it has all the facilities like good parking area, good shops of all varieties, PVR movie theaters, a large food court, McDonalds, KFC, etc.  Now the Spencer Hyper market i also active (previously, TATA's Star Bazaar was present, and they vacated couple of years back.)  I liked the Star Bazaar than the Spencer as the new rack arrangements to roof level make me feel claustrophobic.  Also, varieties of Items at Spencer appears to be on lower side than Star Bazaar.The main advantage of this mall is its location, and one need not walk a lot as compared to other malls.  One can drop in to buy single items also and move on without spending lot of time.

Name: ppnpower
Title: good place for timepass
Review: shopping, movies & fun, location is easily approachable just on main road. PVR theaters are good but cramped at the entrance especially at screen-1,2,3.

Name: Jothilingam E
Title: Nice Place to leisure
Review: One of the best malls in Chennai,which is also in the heart of western Chennai.Easilly reachable and ample parking available.Movie theatres are well maintained but expensive snacks!!!!!!!!!!Shopping lovers keep your vallets safe,as you will be tempted to buy all

Name: Mohanathan V
Title: One of good place to hangout
Review: This is one of the good place to hangout inside city. PVR Cinemas here is one of the reason many people comes here. This is a small mall compared to others. There is a fun city here. Food court includes dominoz pizza and KFC.. Big bazaar and other top brand outlets also available here.

Name: chaithu k
Title: Skywalk
Review: The Skywalk mall is small when compared to others like express avenue and forum mall but it has lot of stores of all brands.It has large multiplex too. The parking facility is good

Name: vignesh d
Title: A mall - thats it
Review: Its a typical mall can do decent shopping and for movies its good. If you are going to spend more than an hour park your vehicle in the Parking sheds in front of the mall(In Nelson manikkam road). Its very economical and less time consuming.

Name: dashfaqd
Title: Shopping Arcade
Review: The skywalk mall is small compared to the Express Avenue Mall. Still it has all the popular brand in fashion and dining. Thus one can have a good shopping and have a great time visiting the mall.

Name: 48aravindh
Title: Real skywalk....!!!!
Review: Recently we visited ampa skywalk to shop and watch a movie, the mall is really big than I thought, it has many stores, clustered over four floors, it has a huge multiplex, where we watched a movie, after watching we had some snacks in the food court, which has numerous number of franchise, and they have a good underground parking, which is fully automated one, without any hassle you can park your car, since it is located in the heart of the city, it is easily approachable...!!! I really enjoyed in climbing the crisscrossing escalators, overall we spent a wonderful time here...!!!

Name: SubbaramDanda
Title: A good mall and a nice place to hang aound
Review: We visited the Ampa Skywalk Mall in Aminjikarai, Chennai, recently when we wanted to see a film in the top floor of the mall.  From the moment we passed through the security in the ground floor till we reached the cine complex we could see hordes of people everywhere.  They thronged shops, eateries, entertainment hubs and a variety of other enclosures.  Escalators and elevators were operating to move people from one floor to another.  The corridors and walkways were clean and the air-conditioning was pleasant.  Of course, there were no benches for seniors to sit and relax for a while.  They had to essentially step into an eatery for the purpose. The Ampa mall has been there for quite long and it should be said to its credit that it is  maintaining standards of good house-keeping.

Name: anupam b
Title: Nothing special
Review: As we visited better mall in kolkata and other part so we didn't find anything special. Size is also not big and not small. You will find some branded shops. Food court also didn't get so much option. Though there was kfc...pizza hut and dominos.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Nice Location for a mall.
Review: Spacious mall, good food courts, get so see film shootings ocassionally. Well lit.. has some movies as well..

Name: Sanath K
Title: Interesting place in chennasi
Review: Compare to other malls in chennai skywalk is very small mall, in pvr cinemas were good but the shops were not up to the mark.

Name: silksba0
Title: Perfect shopping location‚Ä¶!!!
Review: Small mall compared with other malls in chennai but worth to visit. This has got PVR Cinemas; children play area, brand stores, food court & ample parking. Cleanliness is maintained even in crowded situation. Good collection of stores will keep you busy. Need to open a hyper market like big bazar/spencer to make the mall perfect shopping location

Name: Arogya Raj
Title: Interesting place
Review: Fun Filled , One mall for all your needs. Fun, joy , happiness in single sight . Loved PVR cinemas .

Name: Selva Kumar A
Title: Small mall with excellent PVR cinemas
Review: The mall is small. Good stalls available for shopping.PVR cinemas is the only attraction to go for.

Name: Arun
Title: Small yet cool mall
Review: I went to Skywalk last month to purchase some clothes and there was many brand stores. The mall was small when compared to other malls in Chennai but it is worth visit. You also have PVR theatres in the third floor. They have a big food court where you can find North Indian food, south Indian food,Burgers, Pizzas and Chaat items. The parking is a little extra on weekends and it is quite reasonable.

Name: venkatesh k
Title: Not worth the hype
Review: Have visited this mall post a lot of hype from friends who are residents of this mall's locality.  Compared to the other city malls this is not having enough shops or features.  Jam packed roads leading upto the mall adds to our misery. If you have booked any movie tickets on the theater in the mall complex, you can visit the mall.  Else, it is not good enough compared to spencer, express avenue, phoenix mall, etc.

Name: Wilson J
Title: Need more improvision
Review: This is a good mall located near the most posh area Anna Nagar , yet this is small in size. Unlike other featured malls , this mall has only less number of Shops & the food mall seems okayish :)

Name: IMumbaitraveller
Title: Nice setup
Review: Found it cheaper than many other cities when it comes to foodAmbience is nice. PVR is cleanGlad to see landmark back having been taken over by TATA group Got fleeced at gourmet spice shop. Didn't notice rates in non standard weights. Please check prices. Other wise you'll get embarrassed at billing counter....

Name: Sudhir
Title: Good Mall
Review: This is a small mall when compared to other malls in the city.It has got cinemas, children play area, shops and also ample parking.When i visited recently, all the food shops were closed as reason was cited that they haven't obtained license for the restaurants. So I wont recommend it to fellow travellers if food is not available.

Name: JumboMumbai
Title: Godd but crowded
Review: This part of tow got a mall and also a good one.  But the result is a nightmare on weekends with parking full and no place to peae fully walk inside the mall.  There is maximum no of shops with electronics topping and then there is the cineplex with PVR on the 4th floor if you get tred of shopping. Hot and happening Chennai mall.

Name: Ajith Setty
Title: Just another Mall ..Nothing Great to mention.
Review: Visited this mall when i was on a business trip to Chennai.Just another mall like any other mall, nothing great specifically to mention.Can visit for some shopping and time pass.

Name: 06Adam
Title: Average mall on the West side of the City
Review: Whilst there are number of malls coming up in the centre of City from the Spencer plaza of those days to the Express Avenue of today, this place has a history of various hotels operated during its lifetime. Now this has been a new mall which is accessible for people of the Anna nagar and surrounding area.I have seen some people claiming this is dirty because it is situated on the banks of coovum an ester year river which has turned now to be a disposal river for all toxic waste. Well the mall and there are millions of houses on the banks and the cleanliness comes from withing. If you haven't dropped a litter on road in your lifetime you can call this place as dirty however it is the cleanliness inside that matters.CONS:High parking charges similar to most mallsHeavy traffic generated as there is no control of in and out flowing trafficPROS:Mix of Food and entertainment catering to most age groupsAverage cleanliness maintained.Good collection of stores to keep you busy if you are visiting this place.

Name: DeepakSam72
Title: Bad!
Review: Maintenance has always been an issue in this place. Today, I the food court was closed and even McDonalds and KFC were closed. Not sure if they are permanently shut down. Surprised to see Swenson's open an outlet here - BTW this closed too today.

Name: Kushagra
Title: PVR @ Ampa Skywalk
Review: OK, first things first...I am not writing this review to tell you how great PVR is...its your normal PVR with normal screens and normal seats. Just what you would find everywhere else. This review is specifically for the MOMOS you get at this PVR. Dudddeeee, the chicken momos are so damn tasty here. I am from Delhi and I long for the street food and the momos cause you cannot find it here. But the only reason I prefer ampa skywalk over other cinemas is the momos here. Well as many of you will know momos are nothing if not for the chutney you get with them, cause lets be realistic, momos in themselves are nothing but just all-flour and boiled chicken...tasteless! What makes momos great is that awesome sweet, tangy, spicy chutney which should always come with KFC's tagline "IT'S FINGER LICKING GOOD". Well long story short...do go and try that awesome momos !!

Name: GautamPrashar
Title: Poor maintenance
Review: This mall is the worst mall i have ever seen. no maintenance. even couple of escalators wee also out of order. lack of air-conditioning too.

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: Place for Entertainment !
Review: Its located in the corner of the junction. It has all the facilities with well and good parking space, public transport bus bay, Auto ricshaws bay. Mall has several branded shops . Food court and screens at the top.

Name: Skribbles
Title: Good HyperMall
Review: Though Spencer Plaza and Chennai City centre was available for shopping and mostly food court, chain of restaurants for weekend and holidays, AMPA SKYWALK was the first Hyper Mall in Chennai with all the facilities. For the locals from Annanagar, Mogappair, Ambattur and Avadi this is an easy access from shopping. eateries and esp. movie at PVR cinema. The atrium most of the time is lively and has a theme according to the season and festivals. For families, after a movie, taking the kids to games zone, lunch at food food court/restaurants and complete the shopping at boutiques was an ideal option including the groceries, veggies-fruits at StarBazar like the Big Bazar at Express Avenue..Don't know why it does not exist now, closed last year i think. I am seeing the Spencer's Hyper "To be opened shortly" banner every time i visit from last year.Two wheeler parking fees at Ampa Skywalk mall as in April 2016:Managed by CPS parking system.Wkday - 20 rs per hour & Wkend/Holidays - 25 per hourSame applies for every additional hour.*Loss of ticket - 150 Rs,

Name: Mohan2013
Title: For All Ages
Review: Ideally located on thejunction of  Poonamally High road and Nelso Manickam Roads.Suitable for entertainment , shopping and refreshment.  The hall is genrally well maintained but the restrooms Deidre to be kept properly. many of the toilets are stinking without water and cleaning. It seems the management lost control over the staff.

Name: rohitjain296
Title: best place for everything
Review: this is a small but perfect mall containing all types and needs of shop,funcity and theatre in it.its a perfect place for enjoying ur day and shopping..my college is next to it so i use to go when am free

Name: shishirALD77
Title: Average mall
Review: There is nothing very exciting about this mall as the facilities provided are below average and the service as usual is poor. Even the McDonalds in the mall does not have good service as they boast off.
